id_table_1.caption: Table 1:  Statistic of the rare disease QA (ReDis-QA) dataset.
references: ReDis-QA comprehensively collects data from 1324 rare diseases.  For each rare disease, the questions are collected from seven aspects, including the overview, symptoms, causes, affects, related disorders, diagnosis, and standard therapies of the disease.  ReDis-QA provides the golden answers for these questions.  In this way, ReDis-QA has 9268 QA pairs in total.  The overview of the ReDis-QA dataset is given in Figure  1 .
